title: Certified International Magic of Christmas Snowman 16 oz. Mugs, Set of 4, 4 Count (Pack of 1), Multicolored
features: Includes: Magic Of Christmas Snowman 16 oz. Mugs, Set of 4

description: Smiling Snowmen joined by their woodland pals decorate Certified International’s “ Magic of Christmas- Snowman” ceramic dinnerware and serveware, designed by Susan Winget. Sentiments of the season such as “Winter Blessings” and touches of plaid add charm to these 4 assorted snowy scenes, which coordinate with the “Magic of Christmas Santa “ collection. Add a whimsical touch with the 3-d Snowman cookie jar and S&P set.
